mil3.4.8:1.5_0: “Sabbe bālaputhujjanā kho, mahārāja, ajjhattikabāhire āyatane abhinandanti abhivadanti
mil3.4.8:1.5_1: ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti, te tena sotena vuyhanti, na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena
mil3.4.8:1.5_2: sokena paridevena dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi na parimuccanti dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
mil3.4.8:1.6_0: Sutavā ca kho, mahārāja, ariyasāvako ajjhattikabāhire āyatane nābhinandati nābhivadati
mil3.4.8:1.6_1: nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, tassa taṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato taṇhā
mil3.4.8:1.6_2: nirujjhati, taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhā
mil3.4.8:1.6_4: evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti, evaṁ kho, mahārāja, nirodho nibbānan”ti.
